item.title: There is a large steep dip in the road outside of 289 Burnt Oak Lane which needs to be repaired ASAP- a lot of buses drive over this which causes this house to shake and has caused the walls in house/kitchen to crack, 9th October
item.description:
There is a large steep dip in the road outside of 289 Burnt Oak Lane which a lot of buses drive over and this causes the house to shake and has caused the walls in the house/kitchen to crack- please can this be investigated and repaired ASAP- there are other dips further up the road which have however previously been repaired.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Elmcroft Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gipsy Hill SE19 between Gipsy Hill railway station and, 9th October
item.description:
Gipsy Hill SE19 between Gipsy Hill railway station and streetlight column ID number 606 # 25 (ie north of the railway station) is a black plastic Lambeth newspaper recycling bin which is tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4246897,-0.0835816,3a,70.2y,253.02h,84.6t/data=!3m8!1e1!3m6!1s2pdLoyGdqBSEMxiSzp017Q!2e0!5s20230301T000000!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D5.402573067639011%26panoid%3D2pdLoyGdqBSEMxiSzp017Q%26yaw%3D253.01710811279602!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTAwNi4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sainsbury Road, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
